==== Goals of this Team ====
* Marketing team keep an open eye for opportunities for the team to gain exposure.

==== Joining  Requirements: ====
1. Basic understanding of linux community LoCos and user groups.

1. Register yourself on launchpad.net, '''<nowiki>[[https://login.launchpad.net/+new_account|here]]</nowiki>'''.
